excerpt: "As the world is reeling from the COVID-19 pandemic without a clue when the crisis will wither away, innovation and technology play a vital role in alleviating the impacts. Innovation and technology not only bring convenience to everyday life but also are an efficient tool to support medical professionals and the overall healthcare sector."
